# Getting Started

## Installing and uploading R packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman :: p_load (sf, tmap, sfdep, tidyverse)
```
:::


# The Data

## Importing geospatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "Hunan")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

## Importing aspatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
:::


## Perform left join


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_GDPPC <- left_join(hunan, hunan2012) %>%
  select(1:4, 7, 15)
```
:::


## Plot choropleth map


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(hunan_GDPPC) +
  tm_fill("GDPPC", 
          style = "quantile", 
          title = "GDPPC") + 
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of GDP per capita by country, Hunan Province", 
            main.title.position = "center", 
            main.title.size = 1.2, 
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 0.35, 
            frame = TRUE) + 
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) + 
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) + 
  tm_scale_bar() + 
  tm_grid(alpha = 0.2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Deriving contiguity weight: Queen method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wm_q <- hunan_GDPPC %>%
  mutate(nb = st_contiguity(geometry),
         wt = st_weights(nb,
                        style = "W"),
         .before = 1)
```
:::


## Compute Global Moran I


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
moran_I <- global_moran(wm_q$GDPPC,
                        wm_q$nb,
                        wm_q$wt)
glimpse(moran_I)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
List of 2
 $ I: num 0.301
 $ K: num 7.64
```
:::
:::


## Performing Global Moran I test


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_test(wm_q$GDPPC,
             wm_q$nb,
             wm_q$wt)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

## Perform Global Moran I permutation test


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}

                  wm_q$nb,
                  wm_q$wt,
```
